abstract: The vote by the panel advising the Food and Drug Administration was a rare reprieve to Amgen, the manufacturer of the drugs.
snippet: The vote by the panel advising the Food and Drug Administration was a rare reprieve to Amgen, the manufacturer of the drugs.
lead_paragraph: A federal advisory committee voted yesterday against imposing a new restriction on the use of anemia drugs to treat patients with kidney disease, offering a rare reprieve to Amgen, the manufacturer of the drugs.

headline.main: F.D.A. Advisory Panel Opposes Curb on Anemia Drugs
headline.print_headline: F.D.A. Advisory Panel Opposes Curb on Anemia Drugs, a Break for Amgen
